election_record.label: Illinois 1822 House of Representatives, Pike County

overview.note: Nicholas Hansen's seat was contested by John Shaw. On December 9, 1822, the house seated Hansen by a vote of 20 to 14. However, when it became apparent that Hansen would not vote for submitting to the voters the question of calling a constitutional convention, the house reopened the question and seated Shaw on February 12, 1823.

election_record.reference: Pease, Theodore Calvin. Illinois Election Returns, 1818-1848. Springfield, IL: The Trustees of the Illinois State Historical Library, 1923. 200.
